General.Name: Industrias Bachoco S.A.B. de C.V.
General.Description: Industrias Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, engages in the breeding, processing, and marketing poultry products in Mexico and internationally. It is involved in the production and distribution of range of chicken products; and production and distribution of white, red, and free-range eggs. The company also provides beef, pork, swine, and balanced animal feed products, as well as various egg dishes. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Celaya, Mexico. Industrias Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Robinson Bours Family Trust.
